descriptions:
Introducing the oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set - your ultimate kitchen companion! This 14-piece set is crafted from high-quality food-grade silicone with a stainless steel core, ensuring durability and heat resistance up to 446 degrees Fahrenheit. The wooden handles not only add a touch of elegance but also provide a comfortable grip, preventing heat transfer.

Our utensils are designed with your health in mind. They are BPA-free, non-reactive with food, and safe for cooking. The one-piece design eliminates any gaps for food particles to hide, making cleaning a breeze. However, please note that these utensils are not dishwasher safe.

The set includes a variety of essential kitchen tools: Deep Soup Ladle, Solid Serving Spoon, Slotted Spoon, Slotted Turner, Turner, Food Tongs, Pasta Server, Flexible Spatula, Basting Brush, Whisk, Round Spatula Turner, Large Skimmer Spoon, Small Silicone Spatula, and a convenient Utensil Holder.

Before first use, we recommend soaking the utensils for half an hour to remove the original smell of silica gel, followed by airing them for about 3 hours. Rest assured, our customer service team is always ready to assist you, with a response time of within 12 hours.

This oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set is perfect for nonstick cookware, offering you a hassle-free cooking experience. Upgrade your kitchen today with this premium utensil set!
